isOpen.description: If `true`, the modal will be open.
isOpen.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则模态框将打开。

onClose.description: Callback invoked to close the modal.
onClose.description_zh: 调用 Callback 以关闭 modal。

allowPinchZoom.description: Handle zoom/pinch gestures on iOS devices when scroll locking is enabled.
allowPinchZoom.description_zh: 启用滚动锁定后，在 iOS 设备上处理缩放/捏合手势。

autoFocus.description:
If `true`, the modal will autofocus the first enabled and interactive
element within the `ModalContent`
autoFocus.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则模态框将自动聚焦第一个启用的交互式
元素

blockScrollOnMount.description: If `true`, scrolling will be disabled on the `body` when the modal opens.
blockScrollOnMount.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则当模态框打开时，将在 'body' 上禁用滚动。

closeOnEsc.description: If `true`, the modal will close when the `Esc` key is pressed
closeOnEsc.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则当按下 'Esc' 键时，模态框将关闭

closeOnOverlayClick.description: If `true`, the modal will close when the overlay is clicked
closeOnOverlayClick.description_zh: 如果为“true”，则单击叠加层时，模态框将关闭

colorScheme.type: whiteAlpha / blackAlpha / gray / red / orange / yellow / green / teal / blue / cyan / purple / pink
colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component

finalFocusRef.description: The `ref` of element to receive focus when the modal closes.
finalFocusRef.description_zh: 当模态关闭时接收焦点的元素的 'ref'。

initialFocusRef.description: The `ref` of element to receive focus when the modal opens.
initialFocusRef.description_zh: 当模态打开时接收焦点的元素的 'ref'。

isFullHeight.description:
If `true` and drawer's placement is `top` or `bottom`,
the drawer will occupy the viewport height (100vh)
isFullHeight.description_zh:
如果 'true' 且抽屉的位置为 'top' 或 'bottom'，
抽屉将占用视区高度 （100vH）

lockFocusAcrossFrames.description:
Enables aggressive focus capturing within iframes.
- If `true`: keep focus in the lock, no matter where lock is active
- If `false`:  allows focus to move outside of iframe
lockFocusAcrossFrames.description_zh:
在 iframe 中启用主动焦点捕获。
- 如果为 'true'：无论锁在哪里处于活动状态，都将焦点保持在锁中
- 如果为“false”：允许焦点移出 iframe

onCloseComplete.description: Fires when all exiting nodes have completed animating out
onCloseComplete.description_zh: 当所有退出节点都已完成动画时触发

onEsc.description: Callback fired when the escape key is pressed and focus is within modal
onEsc.description_zh: 当按下 Esc 键且焦点位于模态框内时触发回调

onOverlayClick.description: Callback fired when the overlay is clicked.
onOverlayClick.description_zh: 单击叠加层时触发的回调。

portalProps.description: Props to be forwarded to the portal component
portalProps.description_zh: 要转发到 portal 组件的 props

preserveScrollBarGap.description:
If `true`, a `padding-right` will be applied to the body element
that's equal to the width of the scrollbar.

This can help prevent some unpleasant flickering effect
and content adjustment when the modal opens
preserveScrollBarGap.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则 'padding-right' 将应用于 body 元素
这等于 ScrollBar 的宽度。

这有助于防止一些令人不快的闪烁效果
和内容调整（当模态框打开时）

returnFocusOnClose.description: If `true`, the modal will return focus to the element that triggered it when it closes.
returnFocusOnClose.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则模态框将在关闭时将焦点返回到触发它的元素。

size.type: xs / sm / md / lg / xl / full

trapFocus.description:
If `false`, focus lock will be disabled completely.

This is useful in situations where you still need to interact with
other surrounding elements.

🚨Warning: We don't recommend doing this because it hurts the
accessibility of the modal, based on WAI-ARIA specifications.
trapFocus.description_zh:
如果为 'false'，则焦点锁定将完全禁用。

这在您仍然需要与
其他周围元素。

🚨警告： 我们不建议这样做，因为它会伤害
基于 WAI-ARIA 规范的模态可访问性。

useInert.description:
A11y: If `true`, the siblings of the `modal` will have `aria-hidden`
set to `true` so that screen readers can only see the `modal`.

This is commonly known as making the other elements **inert**
useInert.description_zh:
A11y： 如果为 'true'，则 'modal' 的兄弟姐妹将具有 'aria-hidden'
设置为 'true'，以便屏幕阅读器只能看到 'modal'。

这通常被称为使其他元素 **惰性**
